sign_in.sign_in_error: The username or password is incorrect
sign_in.sign_up_application: Login and password can be obtained only after submitting
sign_in.please_enter_email: Please enter your e-mail, and we will send you all the necessary information to create an account.
sign_in.will_contact_you: We will contact you to create an account
sign_in.set_a_new_password: We care about your safety. Set a new password so that your account is securely protected.

university.empty_profile: The profile is still empty. Fill it out so that applicants can learn more about you!
university.description_displayed: This description is displayed when viewing the main page
university.add_admission: Add a link to the page for applicants from your university's website
university.add_career: Add a link to the careers section from your university's website
university.add_faq: Add a link to the Q&A section from your university's website
university.add_courses: Add a link to the preparatory courses page from your university's website

gallery.no_photos: There are no photos in your profile yet.
gallery.delete_title: Do you really want to delete the selected photos?
gallery.delete_description: They will disappear from the gallery and you will not be able to restore them.

booklets.no_booklets: There are no booklets in your profile yet.
booklets.enter_a_description: Enter the description of the booklet
booklets.delete_title: Do you really want to delete the selected booklet?
booklets.delete_description: It will disappear from the booklet list, and users will no longer be able to view it.

events.no_events: You don't have any events yet.
events.name: Event name
events.choose_a_visibility: Select who will have access to the event
events.enter_link: Enter a link to the website or other sources

advertisements.no_advertisements: You don't have any ads running yet. Create it and attract new applicants.
advertisements.heading: Heading
advertisements.subtitle: Subtitle
advertisements.manager_will_write: Manager will write to this email address

mail_list.no_standard_mail_list: You don't have any standard mailing lists yet
mail_list.no_automatic_mail_list: You don't have any automatic mailing lists yet

subscribers.loading_description: Applicants fill out a form with information about their education, language skills, need for a dormitory, and educational interests. This data can be uploaded in Excel format.
subscribers.don_t_have_subscribers: You don't have any subscribers yet

students.don_t_have_students: You don't have any students yet
students.delete_description: Do you really want to remove the selected users from the list of students?

ambassadors.don_t_have_ambassadors: You don't have any ambassadors yet
ambassadors.delete_description: Do you really want to remove the selected users from the list of ambassadors?

employers.don_t_have_employers: You don't have any employers yet
employers.adding_description: Fill out the form to add an employee. You can make an employee of a user who does not have the status of "Student" or "Ambassador"
employers.delete_description: Do you really want to remove the selected users from the list of employers?
